description:
While her fighting abilities are limited, she is a powerful user of mind-control and illusion. She wishes to destroy every single toushi that exists, after first having broken all bonds of love or friendship that they have. This stems from her childhood, when she was harassed and assaulted for being different from the other children.
Finding friendship with Sonsaku and the others, she has given up her hatred and now stays with http://anidb.net/ch16844 [Choushou], along with http://anidb.net/ch7499 [Sonken].
name: Saji Genpou
